content: better to mention about the time out issue in the statement, so we can consider about it at beginning.
Hard but good challenge for better coders. The large numbers makes it very interesting because of timeoutes!

First obvious solution is O(n^3) but it can be done under 3-4 mins. So you'll still have time for the optimized solution for the long test case, stub hints at it well enough anyway. Even if you lose time with the first solution, it can still be done under 15 mins if you pay enough attention

No , it is not too complex ... just enough to make it interesting

Solvable in 5 minutes. I did it in php and python3 (both in less than 4m45)

This clash is one of the few that i want to see accepted

I updated the stub generator to add the output

toooooooo complex for a short clash and the solution is given for only java...

please gives it's solution in python 3 also cause there is no use of such a puzzle which can't be solved in other language in shortest mode.

i solved it with python 3 using for loop and it solves all but test case 09 and validator 5 due to presence of very large numbers and tells my solution is not optimized enough and the process times out...

i am downvoting until i find a better solution...

>i am downvoting until i find a better solution...
This doesn't even make sense

>please give its solution in python3
Why? It can be solved with less characters in Ruby and many other languages
The naive solution's complexity is not O(N^3). It is O(N*d^2), where d is the largest span of all input ranges.
everyone got 85% and then I realize that I need a "memoize" to solve the issue...

some in codingame are students and focus only on one language.
also if a problem can be solved only in one language than it's frustating for those who don't know that language

>some in codingame are students and focus only on one language
so you are saying that since you are incapable of learning another language, everyone should stick to one language

>if a problem can be solved only in one language
It can be solved in any language

Also, why are you upvoting all of your comments lmao
